title: Godzilla roars his way onto Apple TV+ in Monarch: Legacy of Monsters teaser
description: "If you come with me, you'll know everything, I promise."

title: X sues Calif. to avoid revealing how it makes “controversial” content decisions
description: X decried law's "draconian financial penalties" up to $15K per violation per day.

title: FTC judge rules Intuit broke law, must stop advertising TurboTax as “free”
description: Intuit plans appeal, slams FTC's "predetermined decision."

title: The AI-assistant wars heat up with Claude Pro, a new ChatGPT Plus rival
description: For $20 a month, Claude fans can get 5x higher usage limits, early access to new features.

title: Record-breaking Super Mario Bros. speedrun approaches robotic perfection
description: Runner is a modern-day John Henry, just 0.35 seconds from tool-assisted speedrun mark.

title: Cisco security appliance 0-day is under attack by ransomware crooks
description: With no patch available yet, users must enable workarounds. The best: enforce MFA.

title: FAA says SpaceX has more to do before Starship can fly again
description: The federal regulator says SpaceX must implement 63 corrective actions.

title: The most interesting keyboard released this week is also the cheapest
description: Keychron challenges expectations for a budget mechanical keyboard.

title: Gears Technica: Favorite coffee-making setups from the Ars Technica staff
description: From espresso to Nespresso, we share our favorite coffee setups.

title: X “unfit” for banking because of complicity in Saudi spying, lawyers argue
description: Read the letter urging regulators to end Musk’s dream of turning X into a bank.

title: 4th FTX exec pleads guilty, agrees to forfeit Porsche and other property
description: Ryan Salame hit with $1.6B judgment, but US accepts $6M and forfeited property.

title: Google shows off the Pixel 8 and Pixel Watch 2 ahead of launch
description: After a few leaks, Google just went ahead and made these devices official.

title: The International Criminal Court will now prosecute cyberwar crimes
description: Russia’s cyberattacks against civilian infrastructure in Ukraine may be the first case.

title: Judge issues legal permaban, $500K judgment against serial Destiny 2 cheater
description: Restraining order also issued due to threats and harassment of Bungie employees.

title: OpenAI admits that AI writing detectors don’t work
description: No detectors "reliably distinguish between AI-generated and human-generated content."

title: The Daughter of the Night walks the land in this week’s Wheel of Time
description: Bad things are afoot—the Shadow gets its act together as our heroes flail in darkness.

title: Ars system mini-guide: Summer GPU refresh edition, aka “can it run Starfield”?
description: New GPUs and new games prompt minor refreshes to our bang-for-buck PC builds.

title: BMW decides heated seat subscriptions are a bust
description: The option was never offered to US customers anyway.

title: Rocket Report: Japan launches Moon mission; Ariane 6 fires up in Kourou
description: Japan's mission will attempt to make a precise landing on the Moon next year.
